data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kajiado, Kenya, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kajiado, Kenya

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Kajiado, Kenya to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Kajiado, Kenya to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kajiado, Kenya the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Nubian people.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kajiado.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 207,721 people in the state of Kajiado who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kajiado, Kenya humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Kajiado
location.people_groups_list: Maasai, Hindi, Chinese, general, Kalenjin, Okiek, Marathi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Maasai (1,157,000), Hindi (6,700), Chinese, general (35,000), Kalenjin, Okiek (103,000), Marathi (500)
